trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ624_02802_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the muu shuwuu eggs to Jenkshi.
TEXT_STMBDZ624_02802_JENKSHI_000_000<tab>I have heard you successfully followed in Bardam's footsteps. This must mean you are capable of flight, yes? Because I require the aid of such an individual.
TEXT_STMBDZ624_02802_JENKSHI_000_001<tab>My sheep has fallen ill and I need the eggs of a muu shuwuu in order to treat her.
TEXT_STMBDZ624_02802_JENKSHI_000_002<tab>However, I cannot obtain one of their eggs on my own. Muu shuwuu build their nests in high places and I am yet to conquer Bardam's Mettle.
TEXT_STMBDZ624_02802_JENKSHI_100_002<tab>Please, bring me three eggs. My flock's lives depend on it!
TEXT_STMBDZ624_02802_JENKSHI_000_003<tab>Please, bring me three muu shuwuu eggs. My flock's lives depend on it!
TEXT_STMBDZ624_02802_JENKSHI_000_010<tab>Were you able to get three eggs for me? My sheep does not have long left!
TEXT_STMBDZ624_02802_JENKSHI_000_012<tab>This disease spreads quickly if not dealt with early on. I could not bear the idea of losing a single sheep, never mind the whole flock.

TEXT_STMBDZ624_02802_JENKSHI_000_013<tab>It shall not be easy, but I too must conquer Bardam's Mettle if I am to look after my flock on my own. Thank you for your help this time, my sheep would be done for without you.
